adus.text: For it also means that over a third of the population is more or less aware of his identity-not bad at all, I would say, for a city about half of whose current inhabitants are of non-European descent.
During a nightly patrol of the guard a fight broke out in which a man was stabbed.
The immense effort it takes to find out the truth about our past also serves as a reminder that we are finite, feeble and fragile.
